name: Aunt Butchie's of Brooklyn
address: 4864 Arthur Kill Rd, Staten Island, NY 10307, USA

reviews.text: Great restaurants with tons of options to choose from including vegetarian

Wife and I stopped in for a late lunch early dinner bite. Wife was craving stuffed artichoke  So we started with a stuffed artichoke and the stuffed meatball and they were delicious. Artichoke could‚Äôve had another couple minutes to really heat up core but was delicious. Nice and lite sauce very tasty.
Stuffed meatball was also great. We ended with artichoke rizoto and it was  creamy nice chunks of artichoke hearts very good.

We were there last week for a repast luncheon and the food and service was excellent.  Salad, appetizers and pasta course was served family style and they took orders for the choice of entree.  I had  filet of sole oreganota and it was delicious.  The meatball appetizer was also great.  My favorite was the fried zucchini because they cut it so thin, probably using a "vegettie" type of tool, and then fry it so it is perfectly crispy and light.  I'm looking forward to going back on a happier occasion.
Food was quite good, But the music was much too loud, could not hear our table conversations. It should be toned down
Excellent  food and service.

The experience was so amazing I didn't even take the time to take more pictures. We had to wait for our table despite having reservations because it was so busy but we sat at the bar and had a drink while we waited. Once we were seated our servers were wonderful, food was amazing, fried calamari was perfect , bread hot and fresh. Great experience overall, will definitely return!

We went to Aunt Butchies for lunch today after a long absence and can't understand why we forgot about it. The food is always awesome,  even the bread and olive oil is as good if not better than you will get anywhere.  I got a chicken cutlet sandwich that could've fed 2 and it was delicious.  The atmosphere is beautiful,  excellent service and ample parking.  We will definitely be back soon!
Cut corners and charge more money..
Food was delicious and the wait staff were friendly. No one rushed us to either order or so they could turn over the table. It was an enjoyable evening.

We had a surprise party for 55 people on Sat 8/9 in the Staten Island location.   It was FANTASTIC!

The food was delicious, the service great and the overall experience couldn't have been better.  Peter, Angelo and the team provided excellent suggestions and delivered from booking the party to ensuring that every guest was happy.

Would highly recommend!!!!

Plan to go back soon.
Great staff ...bread is amazing. Desserts are ridiculously good . I had the chicken marsala and would eat it every day if i could.  Next time, I'm trying the veal.Reasonably priced !

The food is 5+ star in this place, So delicious- appetizers, main course and desserts. However, the service was terrible. After my pasta was served, even though I and my husband asked for parmesan cheese, the waiter never returned with it. I needed to go and look for someone to give me the cheese. The dirty dishes were piling up on our table. Nobody even came and asked if we want another drink, or fill up our water. In restaurant where you pay $100+ for your meal, one should be provided with adequate service. Sadly, this location of Aunt Butchie's is a big miss when it comes to service. Very disappointing considering amazing quality of food.
BEST ZUPPA DI CLAMS EVER
Bill was $180 for four people very overpriced and the food was not that good
good foor good deal full  apatizer and a dinner for 30 dollars had to take food home
Had my mother's 80th birthday party at Aunt Butchies. Food was delicious and there was a wonderful variety. All staff was very helpful.. I would definitely have another party here.
Elegant yet home like . Service good food even better . Your treated like family when you go there to dine .a Must try !! I'm a regular
I only went for lunch and it was fabulous. I had the Chicken Limoncello Hero and a Caramel Cone. Both was delicious.  Took a Cappuccino Mousse to go. I will be back.

I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve ever had WORSE pizza at an Italian restaurant in my life.  The Margarita Pizza was worse than a frozen pizza you can buy at the supermarket.  Thin, hard crust (maybe frozen dough?), & dark, overcooked sauce on top.  Really???
Salads were fine.  My husband‚Äôs orrechiette with broccoli rabe was only fair because pasta was very overcooked.  Filet of sole oreganatto was also fair because it was soggy on top.
There‚Äôs really no compelling reason to ever go back here.
Do better Aunt Butchie‚Äôs!
Ceaser salad was good.. but loved the chicken Parm w vodka sauce
Food is delicious, reasonably priced, and a family atmosphere.

I have been going to Aunt Butchies since I moved to the island 7 years ago.  The food is always consistent and delicious üòã especially the stuffed meatballs! They always have amazing lunch and dinner specials.  $12 pasta Tuesdays is a family favorite with a great menu and huge portions.  We have had many parties at Aunt Butchies that guests always enjoy.  My grandfather is vegan,  Pete always goes above and beyond to take care anyone‚Äôs dietary needs.  Catering is always top notch! Thank you guys! Keep doing what you‚Äôre doing üëåüèº

Beautiful atmosphere, owners are hands on always accommodating, friendly & attentive staff, & amazing food! If you want to try traditional Italian cuisine & plates with bursts of flavor please try Aunt Butchies. Both locations are phenomenal! We are always happy with their service & dishes.
Went for lunch before we went to my cousins wake. It was a recommendation and it didn't disappoint. Great food at reasonable prices can't be beat!!

I had a great time eating here. The ambiance and decor were great. The food was amazing, I can‚Äôt wait to come back here with my family. Their staff and service were great. Everyone working was so kind and polite.

it‚Äôs a shame to be writing such a terrible review, but I have to be completely honest. My mom went for dinner tonight with four of my aunts and got drugged. She had one drink, ordered a second, had a sip of it, and started to feel violently ill. She went in the bathroom, throwing up, confused, crying, and shaking. She was unsure of her surroundings and what was happening to her. we took the food to go and left the restaurant immediately to take her to the hospital. She was dazed and confused and had no idea what was happening. She clearly had been drugged. I called the restaurant and asked for the manager to kindly let him know that this is what happened and to please watch the cameras or watch the bar because something is going on there. He laughed at me, refused to help me, said that these type of things don‚Äôt happen at his restaurant and made it a joking matter. I told him that I was not looking to make a spectacle out of anything, I just wanted to let him be aware of what was going on in their establishment. I also did not accuse any of the staff there for doing this, as it could have been anyone sitting by the bar. These types of things happen even in restaurants where you wouldn‚Äôt imagine they would take place. I definitely will be getting in touch with the owner as I know him from my neighborhood that I grew up with in Brooklyn to let him know that his staff was completely unresponsive and rude and refused to help and also let him know that this is what is taking place in his restaurant. I‚Äôm truly so disappointed. We are a long time customers of aunt butchies, from when they started back in the day in Brooklyn. it saddens me to have to write this kind of review, but the manager Angelo really pushed me over the edge. He was extremely rude and hung up on me, refusing to help me or say that this possibly could have happened in the restaurant. Please watch your drinks there and be careful. This is not a joking matter. Something terrible could happen to somebody if they are drugged and they are alone or don‚Äôt have the right people with them to take them home to safety.
Great experience dining there this evening. Food, atmosphere, service on point. We will definitely be back!
Very nice place

Went for dinner on a Monday night for my husband‚Äôs birthday. Restaurant was full but not packed. Service was quite slow. They seemed to have adequate staff for the amount of tables. Each time they left, it would take them forever to come back for us to ask for anything else. They were nice though when we were able to get a hold of them. The dishes were hit or miss. The free bread was delicious so we had high hopes for the pizza. We ordered a basic margherita pizza and it was awful. It was small, more like a personal pizza. The crust was thick, hard, and crunchy (not in a good way) but the middle was soggy. Don‚Äôt know how they managed that. Tried the stuffed meatball and that was a disappointment also. I was expecting melt mozzarella to ooze out but it was just a lump of ricotta. On the plus side, the calamari and rigatoni aunt butchies were delicious. The portions were big.
Great food
went to the city for the Christmas tree in Rockefeller center and came back to SI for a family dinner.  The food was great!
Food is delicious and the owner and staff are super friendly and welcoming!
Went here for a luncheon and the food and service was excellent
Great atmosphere, fantastic food

Had dinner here this evening with our daughter, son-in-law and 2 grandkids. Even though we were late for our reservation, everything about our dining experience was great. I'd highly recommend Aunt Butchies. The host, bartender and servers were all terrific and the grandkids loved choosing dessert to take home. We'll be back.

The Food is always spot on and delicious. The atmosphere is very warm and welcoming. The staff are very attentive and take very good care of you. Pete is also an amazing host who truly cares about his customers and continues to have an amazing restaurant.
We were entertained royally by a wonderful singer this Thursday - Charlie Romo. The food was wonderful and large portions. Service was great.

Food was delicious and the restaurant was beautifully designed. The place was busy so that's a good indicator. This is our first time eating at Aunt Butchies in Staten Island. We usually go to the NJ location. A. Butchies serves authentic Italian cuisine. I highly recommend it.

Loved this place! The food was delicious üòã service was great!
Highly recommend
Staff is great, excellent service.  Food (and sangria) is delicious.  Especially loved the salad with strawberries and goat cheese, rigatoni Aunt Butchies, and the vanilla & chocolate tartufo.
The service was excellent and the food was great! The atmosphere was very warm and cozy, and I definitely would dine here again. Overall, a very good dining experience!

My son and I saw Aunt Butchies on TikTok and stopped by on our way home to Washington, DC. We had a wonderful meal this afternoon. The service was attentive and seamless. Alex had the Sunday Sauce pasta. The meatballs and sausage were delicious as was my eggplant parmigiana. The portions are enormous. Great value!!! We finished with cannolis. Heavenly!! Our gracious host Tara made the meal complete. We unconditionally recommend Aunt Butchies of Brooklyn.
Meatball pie was delicious and service was great. Portions were big. The venue is comfortable and spacious... seems like a great place to hold an event. Would definitely head back to this spot.

So I'm so upset to leave this review I love the food here. But I ordered some food here the other day and while I was eating I chomped down on a staple that was in my pizza dough there is no way of communicating with anyone for help and it was after waiting 2 hours for my delivery I was pretty upset and it ruined my entire meal ... if you look at the picture that's what I chewed on and had to spit out...super disappointed how did that staple end up in my pizza dough...

We had our son's wedding rehersal dinner in December 2022. Our party planner Tara was FABULOUS! The dinner party was flawless! So grateful for her hard work. Our guest were delighted. The next day (wedding) the party, complimented the rehersal dinner, yet again. THAT, is what made it even better! Thank you Tara, no amount of words can come close to your diligence!! Agron Family üíã
Great Food and service. A must go to place. You will not be disappointed.
Food was very good. We were there Friday at 11 am. Our food came out fast. Waiter was on point. We will be back

Visiting the area for business, asked the locals where to get some good Italian food. They all recommended Aunt Butchies. Lunch menu was priced right and tasted delicious! If you are visiting the area and want authentic Italian look no further!

This is such a perfect family place (young kids, mature family). They made us feel sooo welcome.  They (the owner / manager?) even let my young boys behind the cookie counter afterward to create their own deserts, "carte blanche" and gave‚Ä¶

Went for my sons graduation June 26th 2023 .and if haven't been here you need to stop in great Italian food own bakery on premises the owner is a a great stand up guy ..the staff amazing and the atmosphere amazing .went with a party of 6  and everyone was wowed .

Great food, great place but if they really need to charge $35 for Rigatoni to keep the lights on, god help us. Please tell me they only charge that because the insurance rates on the Lambo went up. Please, because if not, our economy is in trouble

I've been here for a weekend brunch. The food was great with generous portions and huge menu selection for every picky eater. The service was good, I felt welcome. It was a bit chilly as our table was by the window and we came on a cold day.  There is an extra charge if you pay with the card, as a suggestion, bring cash. Other than that, it is a great family restaurant, I will be coming back.

I had my birthday dinner here with a group of about 12 people .The food was amazing! Family style dining with generous amounts of food. Everything they brought out tasted amazing. The atmosphere in the formal dining section was terrific. A‚Ä¶
Food was great..Service was excellent. We had the appetizer huge meatball it was delish.‚ò∫

Great food, great staff, great atmosphere. Enough said. Definitely pay them a visit for dinner. I'll be back many times.

Update 8/14/2021

We recently hosted a baby shower here for my wife. The staff was friendly, attentive, and very professional. Joe, our personal waiter, was the best. We never felt neglected or underserved at all. The food was great as always. Never a complaint about the food and our guests were raving about how great it was. Lastly, our hostess Tara was excellent. She helped us plan the event from start to finish. She answered all our questions and assisted us with all the details. Our shower wouldn‚Äôt have been such a success without her. This combination of professionalism, service, and great food are just a few of the many reasons why we‚Äôll be back for dinner again, and why we‚Äôll host our future events here. Definitely consider Aunt Butchies for your events.
Had my daughters confirmation party there on Easter Sunday. Pete the owner made sure everything was perfect! Food was great everyone was so full. We love this place and we will be back soon
